setup_script_description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu
specific_user_instruction: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Size' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Size' menu with  down arrow. | Navigate to 'X-Small' with down arrow. | Activate 'X-Small'. with Enter. | Open 'Size' menu with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Smaller' menu item
output_assertions: The position of the item and number of items in the menu  are conveyed
